issue.title: [Rust]: Write documentation for AVX-512 in the Arrow Readme
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10614](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10614). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Write documentation about how SIMD related features work in addition to `avx512` feature which will be introduced under this tracking issue.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10614?focusedCommentId=17332161) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
